Subjects study undergo 8-week double-blind , placebo-controlled trial . Subjects regular cannabis-users currently seek treatment cannabis dependence . During abstinence condition ( B , C , D , E condition ) , subject allocate one condition include self-titration placebo , fix dose placebo , self-titration SATIVEX ( max 40 spray per day , equal 108mg THC ) fix dose SATIVEX ( 40 spray per day ) . Each medication phase follow washout period individual request smoke cannabis usual ( A condition ) . The experimental condition : type SATIVEX® spray use ( active v placebo ) , titration regimen ( fix self-titrated ) .
